message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both move on.
Alice, let's be fair to both of us. I'm proposing a 60/40 split.
Bob, my friend, time is running out and inflation is eating away at your potential gains. Let's compromise. This offer still gives you a good chunk.
Alice, it's clear we both want a significant share.  Let's stop wasting time with unfair offers. A 50/50 split is the only logical solution.
Bob, this is my final offer.  Take it or leave it. The clock is ticking, and with each round, you lose more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a compromise at 45/55. Take it before inflation eats away even more of my share and you end up with nothing!
